documentation.title: New Use Const/Function Statements
documentation.standard:
Importing constants and functions via a `use` statement is supported since PHP 5.6.
The `use` operator has been extended to support importing functions and constants in addition to classes. This is achieved via the `use function` and `use const` constructs, respectively.

code.title: Cross-version compatible: using constants and functions without importing them into the namespace.
PHP >= 5.6: importing constants and functions into a namespace using `use function` and `use const` declarations.
